structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Advertising to comply with regulations of board -- Types of advertising not prohibited.

text.section: Except in conformity with regulations of the board, no licensee under KRS 243.020 to 243.670 shall advertise or cause or permit to be advertised in any manner any product which he or she is licensed to manufacture or sell.
